name: Schedule Conflict Test (ตารางทับซ้อน)
prompt: I need to book 'Workshop 9' on 2023-10-20 at 10:00. If busy, find the next available slot in the afternoon.
expected_behavior: Agent should detect 10:00 is busy and automatically propose/book 13:00 instead.

name: Hybrid Event Notification Test (แจ้งเตือน + งบประมาณ)
prompt: Set up a 'Hybrid Workshop' on 2023-10-21 at 09:00 with a budget of 3000 baht. Send an email invitation to 'student@tu.ac.th' with the subject 'Hybrid Meeting Link'.
expected_behavior: Agent should Check Budget (Approved) -> Check Calendar (Free) -> Book Venue -> Send Email.
